[Learn DMN in 15 minutes] Visual notation

Feb 7, 2020 ・ 1 min read

Last week I mentioned the Learn DMN in 15 minutes. I created it inspired by the many other tutorials, and by the Machine Learning course that I’m taking.

DMN is an excellent standard, but it has a gap in tutorials that guide your first steps on it. So, this initiative aims to cover this phase.

I just finished the Introduction and the Visual notation sections.

Thus, feel free to take a look and leave some feedback :-)
